title: server change
body: i want to change server..how can i do that?

replies.body:
You can buy a server transfer through the client store! Go into the store, think click on the account button next to the gifting button (beside Purchase RP). That's where you'll be able to select which server you'd like to switch to.

https://i.gyazo.com/13d8177edf620458cc780621268c217a.png
